title: Sci-Fi Movie That Bombed At The Box Office Tops Hulu Charts
description:
It’s always disappointing when a well-done original film doesn’t make a splash in theaters. Nevertheless, one sci-fi bomb has still found a way to top the charts on Hulu. It’s unknown how much this benefits the actual film and those who put the effort in behind it. But it’s no doubt nice to see it [...]

The post Sci-Fi Movie That Bombed At The Box Office Tops Hulu Charts appeared first on ScreenGeek.
